TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
> 
> This is the first time I'm downloading the gantry. Do I just put the gantry folder in Gamedata?

Yes. Got kerbal konstructs mod?

Ingame I think you need to press ctrl+k

Then choose tower and set it to ground and save

- - - Updated - - -

Btw if you have the gantry of mine installed already and you install my new one you wont need to do anything ingame. It will just update the 3d model basically

- - - Updated - - -

I should note that if you use the crawler dont use launch clamps. Use the floating node. It is a decoupler, or surface attach other decouplers or struts to it

Well, to be fair I still got it into orbit even with all those issues. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) So, it works, but is a real handful. Doubling the mass of the SRBs would go a long to way to calming it down and making the ascent far closer to reality.
I have a KSPAVIextensions version issue. How do I manage it?
